start.speaker: Void Sentinel
start.text:
The Umbral Reaches accept entry. They do not accept return.

The void respects confidence. It eats hesitation first.

choices.text: Swear a vow and enter anyway.
Back away and live with the question.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: The threshold remains. What changes is you: either marked by a vow, or marked by restraint.
